embeddable.name: ${resource:Name}
embeddable.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Configuration_Options"> <property id="embedCode" labelResourceName="EmbedCode" dataType="html" rows="5" enableRichEditing="false" sanitize="false"> <propertyRule name="rule.jsm" /> </property> <property id="sanitizedEmbedCode" dataType="html" rows="5" enableRichEditing="false" sanitize="false" visible="false" /> <property id="autoResize" labelResourceName="AutomaticResize" descriptionResourceName="AutomaticResize_Description" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" /> </propertyGroup>/
embeddable.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="AutomaticResize">Enable Auto Resize</resource> <resource name="AutomaticResize_Description">If enabled, document will be resized to fit width while maintaining aspect ratio. Default is true.</resource> <resource name="Configuration_Options">Options</resource> <resource name="Description">Displays an embed from Google Docs</resource> <resource name="EmbedCode">Embed Code</resource> <resource name="Name">Google Docs</resource> </language>
